game.name: Horses
game.board: Horses is played on a circular board with eight spaces on the perimeter and one in the center
game.pieces: Three pieces per player. Player 1 has blue pieces, player 2 has red.
game.tomove: The board starts out empty. Players take turns placing pieces until they have each placed 3. After this, players take turns moving a piece to an adjacent space
game.towin: The first player to get 3-in-a-Row wins the game.
game.variants: In the regular variant, the first player to get 3-in-a-Row wins. In the misere variant, the first player to get 3-in-a-Row loses.
